A biogeochemistry module for Veros¶

Veros-BGC adds a full-fledged NPZD (Nitrogen-Phosphate-Zooplankton-Detritus) loop on top of the Veros ocean model, with support for custom tracers and additional rules.

Veros-BGC is based on MOBI by Andreas Schmittner, Oregon State University.

Steffen Randrup created Veros-BGC as a part of his Master’s thesis.
